events.message: The insured reported an accident involving their vehicle on the highway, requesting to file a claim for damages sustained.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident following the keywords indicating a car collision incident.
An agent with expertise in vehicle accident claims was assigned promptly to the case to ensure timely assistance.
The insured was notified that their claim has been acknowledged and the process will move forward shortly.
Request sent to the insured for accident report, photos of vehicle damage, and police report to assess the claim.
The insured submitted all requested documentation, including detailed images and official reports related to the accident.
Investigation team has initiated the review of submitted evidence to verify details and determine liability for the collision.
Investigation concluded confirming damages consistent with reported collision; no discrepancies found in submitted evidence.
Based on the investigation report, a settlement offer was proposed covering repair costs and related expenses.
The insured provided positive feedback on the handling of the claim, appreciating the clear communication throughout.
The insurer formally approved the claim to proceed with payment for the vehicle repair as per the settlement.
Payment was issued to the insured for the repair costs with confirmation of transaction sent to their account.
The claim was officially closed following full settlement and confirmation of vehicle repair completion.
All claim documents and communications were archived securely for future reference and compliance purposes.
